alert.note: Alert for Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 3:32AM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch, sleet accumulations up to a quarter of an inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Webster County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening through Monday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on dangerous road conditions and the potential for power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Mississippi can be obtained by visiting mdottraffic.com, dotd.la.gov in Louisiana and idrivearkansas.com in Arkansas.
